snippet.title: Cyber Hook Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Cyber Hook is a fast-paced, 3D platformer that has you using parkour skills and a grappling hook to scale and ride walls, while fighting enemies and blasting blocks with a finger laser gun. Hurtle forward in a gorgeous retrowave environment that you can manipulate via time warping and abusing physics to break the level design.

Wishlist today on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1130410/Cyber_Hook/

Follow us on Social Media for updates!

Website- http://www.graffitigames.com/
Twitter- https://twitter.com/Graffiti_Games
Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/GraffitiGamesPublishing/
https://www.instagram.com/graffiti_games/
